snippet: A glimpse inside the life of the former Rutgers basketball coach who was fired for mistreating his players.
abstract: A glimpse inside the life of the former Rutgers basketball coach who was fired for mistreating his players.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Mahler, a contributing writer for the magazine, wrote this week’s cover story about Mike Rice, the Rutgers basketball coach who was fired for mistreating his players. Mahler last wrote for the magazine about Oakland’s Occupy movement.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Jonathan Mahler on Mike Rice, Rehabilitation and Aggression in College Sports

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
